metadata.name: IVY BEAR #1
metadata.description: Welcome to the World of IVY PETS! Season 2 of IVY BOYS by Aaron Chang brings along a new collection of art reimagined into the perfect little companions to your IVY BOYS & GIRLS. IVY PETS are 7,777 total claimable NFT collectibles divided into 3 separate collections: IVY DOGS, IVY CATS, and IVY BEARS. This marks the continuation of the second phase of our adventure as we expand into the IVY UNIVERSE. Your IVY PETS will reveal a multitude of traits that are not only familiar and exciting, but also surprising! For every IVY PET NFT, you will be able evolve them into SUPER and MEGA PETS with your P3TX Serums. Season 2 also presents IVY ATHLETICS where you and IVY PETS can compete to win prizes. Visit BBRC.io for more details
